definition: unable to control one's grief (idiom); overwrought/overcome with sorrow/heartbroken

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: She was beside herself when she heard of her husband's death.
sentences.chinese: 得悉丈夫的死訊後她悲不自勝。

sentences.english: Now some of us were left disconsolate.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們當中已經有人悲不自勝了。
